example.code:
PS C:\>New-EC2VPC -CidrBlock 10.0.0.0/16
VpcId : vpc-1a2b3c4d State : pending CidrBlock : 10.0.0.0/24 DhcpOptionsId : dopt-1a2b3c4d Tags : {} InstanceTenancy : default IsDefault : False
example.description: Creates a new VPC with CIDR 10.0.0.0/24 in the current default region. This will also create a new default DHCP Options Set, Main Route Table, and Default Network ACL associated with the VPC.
